answers.answer: Hi, I've also been looking for other type 1 mommies-to-be. Right now my blood sugars are constantly low, so I'm having small snacks often.

question: Are there any pregnant diabetic mothers that were diabetic before pregnancy? I am a type 1 diabetic and am looking for tips or advice on what other mommies are doing to control their diabetes or to get A1C within normal range.
title: Diabetic mothers
